translations: v．包围，环绕：在四周形成一个圈子，使某物或某人被包围。

sentences.sentence: A forty-foot-high concrete wall encircles the jail.
sentences.translation: 一道40英尺高的水泥墙环绕着该监狱。

sentences.sentence: A six-sided feature encircles Saturn's North Pole in this 2006 image.
sentences.translation: 在这张2006年所拍摄的照片中，六面特征体包围了土星的北极。

sentences.sentence: Spectators will also be able to view a large LED screen that encircles the stadium.
sentences.translation: 观众还将能看到一个环绕体育场的巨大LED屏幕。
